meanings.definition: The process of developing and printing photographs.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy learning about photofinishings in my photography class.
meanings.sent2: The photofinishings of the family portrait turned out beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The photofinishings of the vacation pictures made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in the photofinishings was like adding magic to the images.
meanings.sent5: The photofinishings brought out the true colors of the landscape.

meanings.definition: The act of adding finishing touches to a photograph.
meanings.sent1: After taking the picture, she focused on the photofinishings to make it perfect.
meanings.sent2: The photofinishings included adjusting the lighting and contrast.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with photofinishings sometimes made him late for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The photofinishings transformed the ordinary photo into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: She spent hours on the photofinishings to ensure every detail was just right.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of providing services related to photography finishing.
meanings.sent1: Many people find job opportunities in the field of photofinishings.
meanings.sent2: The photofinishings market has seen significant growth in recent years.
meanings.sent3: The photofinishings business requires creativity and technical skills.
